wikipedia_page.main: Liam Stephen Livingstone (born 4 August 1993) is an English cricketer who plays for Lancashire and the England cricket team. Livingstone is a right-handed opening batsman and occasional spin bowler, capable of bowling both right-arm leg and off spin. He made his Twenty20 debut for Lancashire against Leicestershire in May 2015. He was awarded the Most Valuable Player in the ECB’s inaugural The Hundred competition.
